channel.title: Shweta Mahajan on The AI Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Shweta Mahajan on The AI Talks

item.title: Multimodal Representation Learning with Deep Generative Models
item.description: Speaker Shweta is currently a postdoctoral researcher in the Vision Group at the University of British Columbia. She obtained her Ph.D. under the supervision of Prof. Stefan Roth, Ph.D. at Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt. Her Ph.D. thesis has been nominated for the Bertha Benz Best Thesis Award and the GI Dissertation Award 2023. During her Ph.D., she conducted research on deep generative algorithms for multimodal representation learning and the efficiency of exact inference deep generative models.
